stats_data.name: mp
stats_data.effect: Determines the amount of spells and skills a unit can cast/use.

stats_data.name: strength
stats_data.effect: Determines the power of physical attacks.

stats_data.name: defense
stats_data.effect: Determines the reduction of physical damage taken.

stats_data.name: magic
stats_data.effect: Determines the power of magical attacks.

stats_data.name: magic defense
stats_data.effect: Determines the reduction of magical damage taken.

stats_data.name: agility
stats_data.effect: Determines how often a unit gets a turn.

stats_data.name: luck
stats_data.effect: Determines the chance of landing and evading a physical attack, as well as the chance of landing a critical hit.

stats_data.name: evasion
stats_data.effect: Determines the chance of evading a physical attack.

stats_data.name: accuracy
stats_data.effect: Determines the chance of landing a physical attack.
